summary: A Giant can easily stomp the Dragonborne if he/she couldn\'t faster enough to get up. Try this.  New Motion and faster than vanilla. If you don\'t like it, No one force you to use it
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow]Add New Get Up Animation, Faster & different from original[/color]

>>>>>>Please stay tune to my stuff & don\'t forget to endorse If you like it<<<<<<<

As you can see.. I\'ve already upload this under Momo Acrobatic but someone suggest me to upload it as separate file... Why not?

[youtube]RltRP-G0OUM[/youtube] [youtube]tItwUIXdunU[/youtube][/center]

If you want to make it apply only to your character, Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14871]PC Exclusive Animation Path[/url]
author: xp32
